We have everything you need

  • Worldwide leader

    Whole world trusts us. We are reliable fundraising platform

  • Simple setup

    You can personalize and share in just a few minutes.

  • 24/7 expert advice

    Our best-in-class customer happiness agents will answer your questions, day or night.

  • Mobile app

    Together makes it simple to launch and manage your campaign on the go.

  • Social reach

    Harness the power of social media to spread your story and get more support.

  • Fast and secure

    Most organizers can withdraw funds immediately and our team works around the clock to protect against fraud.

About us

The website connects community organizations to their supporters who can make donations using debit or credit card.

«Your Help» helps registered community organizations

  • 1

    Track donations received

  • 2

    Reward/recognize donors

  • 3

    Transparency and accountability

  • 4

    Annual reporting

  • 5

    Global platform
